column2: "Na EWURADZE n'asɛm baa mo hɔ
column3: dɛ
column7: na bu bɛ bi kyerɛ Israelmba;"

column2: "na se dɛ
column3: Mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Ɔkɔr kɛse bi
column4: ne ntsaban akɛse akɛse
column6: ntɛkyerɛ ntokowa ntokowa ayɛ no ho ma
column7: baa Lebanon. Ɔbɛgyee nkyindur ndua etsifi
column9: "ɔpempaan no nkɔn mu mfefɛwee afor no
column10: na ɔdze kɔr eguadzi asaase bi do; ɔdze kesii eguadzifo kurow bi mu."

column2: "Ɔfaa asaase no do aba no so bi
column3: na ɔdze kɛtsɛɛw asaaseber mu; ɔdze sii esu pii ho; ɔtsɛɛw no dɛ esukɔndo dua."

column2: "Na onyinii
column3: na ɔbɛyɛɛ wenyindua tantam
column4: na mbom tsiatsiaba a n'abaw tsentsen kɔ no do
column5: na no ndwow wɔ n'ase: nna ɔbɛyɛɛ wenyindua

column2: "Ɔkɔr kɛse bi so wɔ hɔ a ne ntsaban akɛse akɛse na ne ntɛkyerɛ pii: na
column3: hwɛ
column4: wenyindua yi fi n'akɔfi do konkoom no ndwow kɔr no do
column5: na ɔtotoo n'abaw kɔr no do

column2: "Wɔtsɛɛw no asaase pa do wɔ esu pii nkyɛn
column3: ama ɔaatoto abaw
column4: na ɔaasow nduadzewa

column2: "Ka dɛ
column3: Mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Aso obowie yie? Aso onnkotutu no ndwow
column4: na oetwitwa no nduadzewa
column5: ama ɔaakyenkyen; ama n'ahaban momon a ɔfefɛw nyina aakyenkyen; dɛ ɔnndze ahoɔdzen kɛse anaa nyimpa pii a wɔdze botutu no efi no ndwow ase."

column2: "Nyew
column3: hwɛ
column4: woenya atsɛw yi
column5: aso obowie yie? Aso boka mframa ka no a
column6: ɔnnkɛkyenkyen koraa? Ɔbɛkyenkyen wɔ akɔfi a ofifiir wɔ do no do."

column2: "Nkyii so EWURADZE n'asɛm baa mo hɔ
column3: dɛ
column5: "Afei ka kyerɛ etuatsew fi no dɛ
column6: Aso hom nnyim dza ndzɛmba yinom kyerɛ? Ka kyerɛ hɔn dɛ
column11: na ɔdze hɔn baa ne nkyɛn wɔ Babilɔn;"

column2: "na ɔfaa adehye no bi
column3: na ɔnye no dzii ahyɛmu; ɔmaa odzii nsew so
column4: na ɔfaa asaase no do akatakyi no kɔree:"

column2: "ma ahendzi no aabrɛ adze
column3: na ɔaamma noho do
column4: na mbom dɛ obedzi n'ahyɛmu no do na oeegyina."

column2: "Na ɔtseew no do etua tutuu ahembɔfo ma wɔkɔr Egypt
column3: ama wɔaama no mpɔnkɔ na nyimpa pii. Aso obowie yie? Aso nyia ɔyɛ ndzɛmba yinom obefi nsa? Aso ɔbɔto ahyɛmu no
column4: naaso oefi nsa?"

column2: "Dɛ metse ase yi
column3: EWURADZE Nyankopɔn na ɔse
column4: ampaara beebi mbrɛ ɔhen a ɔdze no dzii hen a obuu ne ntam enyimtsia
column5: na ɔtoo n'ahyɛmu no ɔtse no
column6: ne nkyɛn hɔ ara wɔ Babilɔn na obowu."

column2: "Eso Farao nye no dɔm akatakyi na n'asafo akɛse rinndzi mma no wɔ ɔsa no mu
column3: ber a wɔbɔtotow mpampi na woesisi aban
column4: dɛ wotwitwa nyimpa pii egu."

column2: "Osiandɛ oebu ntam no enyimtsia dɛ ɔatoto ahyɛmudzi no ano; na hwɛ
column3: ɔdze ne nsa ama
column4: naaso na ɔayɛ ndzɛmba yinom nyina

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Dɛ metse ase yi
column3: ampaara me ntam no a oebu no enyimtsia
column4: na m'ahyɛdze no a ɔatoto ano no

column2: "Na medze mo boa mebɛtserɛw no do
column3: na wɔapa no wɔ m'efir mu
column4: na medze no aba Babilɔn
column5: na menye no eyi atsɛn wɔ hɔ wɔ ne mbrato a ɔato etsia me no."

column2: "Na n'eguamfo nyinara a wɔwɔ n'asafo asafo mu nyinara bɔtotɔ wɔ afona ano
column3: na hɔn a wɔbɛka no wɔbɔbɔ hɔn apetse mframa nyina mu
column4: na hom bohu dɛ emi EWURADZE mara na maka."

column2: "Mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Mebɛfa nkyindur ndua a ɔkrɔn no nkɔn mu bi so
column3: na medze atsɛw; mebɛpan no nkɔn mu afɔr mfefɛwee fɛɛfɛw no bi
column4: na mara medze akɛtsɛw wɔ bepɔw a ɔwar na ɔkrɔn no no do."

column2: "Israel sorɔnsorɔmbea bepɔw no do na mebɛtsɛw no: ama ɔaatoto abaw
column3: na ɔasow nduaba
column4: na ɔayɛ nkyindur ndua fɛɛfɛw. N'ase na nnoma nyina na ntɛkyerɛmbowa nyina bɛgyegye; no ndubaa no nwinwin mu na wɔbɛgyegye."

column2: "Na haban mu ndua nyina bohu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE. Mebrɛ dua tsentsen adze
column3: na mema dua a ɔwɔ famu no krɔn
column4: na mema dua momon kyenkyen
column5: na mema dua wui yɛ prɔmprɔm: emi mara EWURADZE na mase na mebɛyɛ so."
